title: Activision Blizzard Lawsuit Reactions - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.23.21
description:
Greg and Bless catch you up on the statements, community reactions, and media's role in the Activision Blizzard lawsuit.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:00 - Housekeeping
Emily Is Away 3 is happening right after this. twitch.tv/kindafunnygames and later on youtube.com/kindafunnyplays
Happy 20th birthday, Max Payne!
Thank you to our Patreon Producer Black Jack.
The Roper Report  -
00:07:30 - Activision Fallout
00:41:00 - Ad
00:43:50 - What do you think is games' media role in it? - Best Friends Q:Iztari
00:55:45 - GTA Online Record, Eddie @ GameSpot
01:01:02 - Borderlands Devs Bounce, Megan Farokhmanesh @ Axios
01:05:55 - Out today
01:08:05 - You‘re Wrong
